summary: Project is being paused/discontinued; update the login experience to communicate closure and prevent access.

existing_features.title: Add a horizontally scrolling yellow banner to the top of the Login screen that displays a German discontinuation notice stating the shop is discontinued and will not be worked on anymore.
Disable logging in from the Login screen so users cannot sign in (no successful login via button click or Enter key).

Ensure previously persisted client auth state cannot be used to bypass the discontinued state (if a user is already authenticated in local storage, they should be forced to a non-authenticated/discontinued login view).

Implement a cohesive 'discontinued/caution' visual theme for the login discontinuation experience (typography, spacing, and banner styling) consistent with the existing warm orange/amber palette; do not introduce blue/purple as primary accents.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a yellow horizontally scrolling banner on the login screen (German text) stating the shop is discontinued, and disable login so users cannot sign in.
